Articles.Content:
You know Tim C Kerman, a memorial to the KSP2 dev who sadly passed away. What if instead of a pilot he was an engineer? It would be slightly  cooler because he was a software developer in real life, and that's sort of kind of like an engineer. Also, we already have two pilots, so why not give Bill some company in the engineer's room of the astronaut complex?

Rest in peace Tim Cox
We've got all pilots. There are no classes.

4 hours ago, The Aziz said:

We've got all pilots. There are no classes.

I had no idea. I've been blindly adding Jeb/Val/Tim, Bill, and Bob on my missions for some reason thinking I needed each of the different classes from KSP1 without realizing I didn't need to do that

.
